title: Love at First Bite: 7 Scary-Good Sweets for Halloween
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Taste - Today 
Think beyond candy corns and snack-size Snickers this Halloween and indulge in some of these homemade sweets. Not only are they scary-good, ...
